alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 9:39AM EST until December 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Unadilla affecting Otsego and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Tioga and Bradford Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Tioga and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. Chenango River At Sherburne affecting Chenango County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Tioughnioga River At Cortland affecting Cortland County. Susquehanna River Near Wilkes-Barre affecting Luzerne County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chenango River at Sherburne. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Water spreads throughout agricultural lands nearest the river on the West side of Sherburne. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:02 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 6.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM EST.
